environs.cfg.logging.EnableDebug.tooltip: Enables/disables debug logging of the mod
environs.cfg.logging.VersionCheck.toolti: Enables/disables display of version check information
environs.cfg.logging.FlagMask.tooltip: Bitmask for toggling various debug traces
environs.cfg.biomes.Sealevel.tooltip: Sealevel to set for Overworld (0 use default for World)
environs.cfg.biomes.DimBlacklist.tooltip: Dimension IDs where biome sounds will not be played
environs.cfg.effects.Steam.tooltip: Enable/disable Steam Jets where lava meets water
environs.cfg.effects.Dust.tooltip: Enable/disable Dust Motes dropping from under blocks
environs.cfg.effects.Splash.tooltip: Enable/disable Water Splash effects when water spills down
environs.cfg.aurora.tooltip: Options that control Aurora behavior and rendering
environs.cfg.aurora.MaxBands.tooltip: Cap the maximum bands that will be rendered
